## Feature Request

- Describe what in your opinion is missing in this package and how you and others would benefit from it.
- What is needed to satisfy this request? What solution would you like?
- Are there current workarounds until the feature is implemented? Describe any alternatives you've considered.

## Resolving Problems

Is your feature request related to a problem? Consider a bug report or describe how a new feature could rectify the situation.

A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]
